backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, events, sessions, patterns, recommendations, and stores them with access control, providing query and update methods for user data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to impacted files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries for many frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and analytics utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with root mount node and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/analytics/deriveAnalytics.t: Computes analytics such as focus score, productivity index, trends, and top activities from event data.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and authentication flow, showing profile setup dialog until a user profile exists.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first-time profile setup that saves the user's name or allows exiting to log out.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Displays a login prompt with branding and a card containing a login button.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Renders the LifeOS logo and optionally a hero image.
frontend/src/components/charts/SessionsT: Shows a line chart of session counts over time or a placeholder if no data exists.
frontend/src/components/charts/TimeByCon: Displays a bar chart of time spent per context in minutes.
frontend/src/components/charts/TopActivi: Lists top activities with counts and durations, ranked with badges.
frontend/src/components/context/SessionC: Allows selecting and updating the current session context tag with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with navigation, focus indicators, context tag editor, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/recommendations/: Filters, generates, and displays recommendations with urgency indicators and dismissal options.
Form to configure recommendation thresholds and quiet-hour settings.
frontend/src/focus/blocklist/FocusBlockG: Blocks access to certain routes during focus mode and offers navigation alternatives.
frontend/src/focus/blocklist/useFocusBlo: Manages a user-specific blocklist for focus mode using localStorage.
frontend/src/focus/useFocusMode.ts: Handles focus session state, persistence, and actions like start, pause, and stop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile via the actor with cache synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for querying and mutating events, alerts, recommendations, and analytics-related data through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/insights/formatInsights.ts: Generates human-readable insight summaries from routine patterns and events, including predictions and usage summaries.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the app.
frontend/src/notifications/useInAppNotif: Manages per-user in-app notification preferences persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI that loads analytics data, displays charts and metrics, and shows onboarding content when no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/DataPrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the Data & Privacy page with explanations of collected data, local-first storage, and a toggle for local encryption plus a dialog to clear local data.
frontend/src/pages/FocusModePage.tsx: Implements a focus timer UI with start, pause, and stop controls and displays how Focus Mode affects the app.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Loads all user data, generates AI-driven insights, and displays routines, predictions, and behavior summaries.
frontend/src/pages/RecommendationsPage.t: Displays personalized recommendations with a tabbed interface for viewing suggestions and adjusting recommendation settings.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for focus mode blocklist and in-app notification preferences, allowing toggles for various sections.
frontend/src/privacy/encryption/useLocal: Custom hook managing per-user local encryption preference stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/privacy/encryption/webCrypt: Provides AES-GCM encryption/decryption utilities using Web Crypto API and persists the key in localStorage.
frontend/src/recommendations/preferences: Defines the shape and defaults for recommendation preference settings such as limits and quiet hours.
Manages per-user recommendation preferences in localStorage and provides update and dismissal helpers.
frontend/src/usage/events/types.ts: Defines local event types and converters between local events and backend event formats, including context mapping.
frontend/src/usage/storage/localEventSto: Manages per-user localStorage for events, sessions, and context, including reading, writing, syncing flags, and cleanup.
frontend/src/usage/sync/useEventSync.ts: React hook that periodically syncs unsynced local events to the backend and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/usage/tracking/TrackedButto: Button wrapper that logs a local interaction event on click before executing the original handler.
frontend/src/usage/tracking/useUsageTrac: Hook that tracks sessions, page navigation, and timing, storing related events locally and managing session lifecycle.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, containers, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing LifeOS architecture, constraints, features, and known issues for planning and tracking.
